1.name: Mickey Mouse
1.title: Brave Little Tailor
1.action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
1.flavour: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.

EN.name: Mickey Mouse
EN.title: Brave Little Tailor
EN.action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
EN.flavour: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.

2.name: Stitch
2.title: Rock Star
2.action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 * to play this on top of one of your Stitch characters.)
Adoring Fans Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert it to draw a card.
2.flavour: The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.

EN.name: Stitch
EN.title: Rock Star
EN.action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 * to play this on top of one of your Stitch characters.)
Adoring Fans Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert it to draw a card.
EN.flavour: The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.

3.name: Elsa
3.title: Snow Queen
3.flavour: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an unfamiliar new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

EN.name: Elsa
EN.title: Snow Queen
EN.flavour: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an unfamiliar new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

4.name: Cruella De Vil
4.title: Miserable As Usual
4.action: <mark>You'll Be Sorry</mark> When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
4.flavour: When she stops by, misery is company.

EN.name: Cruella De Vil
EN.title: Miserable As Usual
EN.action: <mark>You'll Be Sorry</mark> When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
EN.flavour: When she stops by, misery is company.

5.name: Maleficent
5.title: Monstrous Dragon
5.action: <mark>Dragon Fire</mark> When you play this character, you may banish chosen opposing character.
5.flavour: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.

EN.name: Maleficent
EN.title: Monstrous Dragon
EN.action: <mark>Dragon Fire</mark> When you play this character, you may banish chosen opposing character.
EN.flavour: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.

6.name: Robin Hood
6.title: Unrivaled Archer
6.action:
Feed The Poor When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
Good Shot During your turn, this character has Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
6.flavour: "We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."

EN.name: Robin Hood
EN.title: Unrivaled Archer
EN.action:
Feed The Poor When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
Good Shot During your turn, this character has Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
EN.flavour: "We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."

7.name: Captain Hook
7.title: Forceful Duelist
7.flavour: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

EN.name: Captain Hook
EN.title: Forceful Duelist
EN.flavour: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

8.name: Mickey Mouse
8.title: Detective
8.action: <mark>GET A CLUE</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
8.flavour: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

EN.name: Mickey Mouse
EN.title: Detective
EN.action: <mark>GET A CLUE</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
EN.flavour: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

9.name: Heihei
9.title: Boat Snack
9.action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)
9.flavour:
„Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface.Far beneath, in some cases. . . .“
−Moana

EN.name: Heihei
EN.title: Boat Snack
EN.action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)
EN.flavour:
„Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface.Far beneath, in some cases. . . .“
−Moana

10.name: Yzma
10.title: Alchemist
10.action: <mark>YOU'RE EXCUSED</mark> Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
10.flavour: "When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"

EN.name: Yzma
EN.title: Alchemist
EN.action: <mark>YOU'RE EXCUSED</mark> Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
EN.flavour: "When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"

11.name: Mickey Mouse
11.title: Musketeer
11.action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
ALL FOR ONE Your other Musketeer characters get +1 ※.

EN.name: Mickey Mouse
EN.title: Musketeer
EN.action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
ALL FOR ONE Your other Musketeer characters get +1 ※.

12.name: Goofy
12.title: Musketeer
12.action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
AND TWO FOR TEA! When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

EN.name: Goofy
EN.title: Musketeer
EN.action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
AND TWO FOR TEA! When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

FR.name: Dingo
FR.title: Mousquetaire
FR.action:
Rempart (Ce personnage peut entrer en jeu épuisé. Lorsqu'il vous défie, un personnage adverse doit, si possible, choisir l'un de vos personnages avec Rempart)
ET DEUX FOIS RIEN ! Lorsque vous jouez ce personnage, vous pouvez retirer jusqu'à 2 jetons Dommage de chacun de vos personnages Mousquetaire.

18.name: Mickey Mouse
18.title: Friendly Face
18.action: <mark>GLAD YOU’RE HERE!</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

EN.name: Mickey Mouse
EN.title: Friendly Face
EN.action: <mark>GLAD YOU’RE HERE!</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

19.name: Elsa
19.title: Gloves Off
19.flavour: The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.

EN.name: Elsa
EN.title: Gloves Off
EN.flavour: The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will help protect Lorcana.

20.name: Genie
20.title: Powers Unleashed
20.action:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

EN.name: Genie
EN.title: Powers Unleashed
EN.action:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

21.name: Stitch
21.title: Abomination
21.flavour:
“His destructive programming is taking effect. He will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe.” 
−Jumba Jookiba

EN.name: Stitch
EN.title: Abomination
EN.flavour:
“His destructive programming is taking effect. He will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe.” 
−Jumba Jookiba

22.name: Maleficent
22.title: Uninvited
22.flavour: She had no invitation−and needed no introduction.

EN.name: Maleficent
EN.title: Uninvited
EN.flavour: She had no invitation−and needed no introduction.

23.name: Maui
23.title: Demigod
23.flavour: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat’s owner is optional.

EN.name: Maui
EN.title: Demigod
EN.flavour: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat’s owner is optional.

DE.name: Malefiz
DE.title: Böser Besuch
DE.flavour: „Die Prizessin soll strahlend und schön wie eine Rose erblühen. Und von einem jeden geliebt werden, der ihr begegnet. Jedoch, bevor sie ihren 16. Geburtstag untergeht, soll sie sich mit der Spindel eines Spinnrades in den Finger stechen ...“

FR.name: Maléfique
FR.title: Sinistre visiteuse
FR.flavour: "La princesse, en grandissant, aura la grâce et la beauté. Chacun l'aimera et lui sera dévoué. Mais ma volonté est telle qu'avant l'aube de ses seize ans, elle se piquera le doigt à la pointe d'une quenouille."

DE.name: Vaiana
DE.title: Von Motunui
DE.action: <mark>WIR KRIEGEN DAS HIN</mark> Jedes Mal, wenn dieser Charakter erkundet, darfst du deine anderen Prinzessinnen bereit machen. Sie können in diesem Zug nicht mehr erkunden.
DE.flavour: „Ich bin Vaiana von Motunui. Du kommst jetzt auf mein Boot, segelst über das Meer und bringst das Herz nach Te Fiti zurück.“

FR.name: Vaiana
FR.title: de Motunui
FR.action: <mark>NOUS ALLONS LE RÉPARER</mark> Lorsque ce personnage est envoyé à l'aventure, vous pouvez redresser vos autres personnages Princesse. Elles ne peuvent pas être envoyées à l'aventure pour le reste de ce tour.
FR.flavour: "Je suís Vaiana de Motunui. Tu vas monter sur mon bateau, traverser la mer et restituer le cœur de Te Fiti."

DE.name: Simba
DE.title: Zurückgekehrter König
DE.action:
Herausfordern +4 (Während dieser Charakter herausfordert, erhält er +4 ※.)
KATZENSPRUNG In deinem Zug erhält dieser Charakter Wendig. (Er kann Charaktere mit Wendig herausfordern.)
DE.flavour: „Ich werde alles tun, um mein Königreich zu retten.“

FR.name: Simba
FR.title: Roi de retour
FR.action:
Offensif +4 (Lorsqu'il défie, ce personnage gagne +4 ※.)
BOND Durant votre tour, ce personnage gagne Insaisissable. (Il peut défier les personnages avec Insaisissable.)
FR.flavour: “Je ferais n'importe quoi pour sauver mon royaume.“

DE.name: Micky Maus
DE.title: Eigenwilliger Zauberer
DE.action:
LEBENDIGER BESEN Du zahlst 1 ⬡ weniger, um Besen auszuspielen.
 UNERMÜDLICHE ARBEITER Jedes Mal, wenn einer deiner Besen durch eine Herausforderung verbannt wird, darfst du jene Karte zurück auf deine Hand nehmen.
DE.flavour: Immer für eine saubere Sache zu haben.

FR.name: Mickey Mouse
FR.title: Sorcier renégat
FR.action:
ANIMER LES BALAIS Les personnages Balai vous coûtent 1 ⬡ de moins à jouer.
 TRAVAILLEUR INFATIGABLE Si l'un de vos personnages Balai est banni via un défi, vous pouvez le reprendre en main.

DE.name: Mulan
DE.title: Kaiserliche Soldatin
DE.action: <mark>MIT GUTEM BEISPIELVORAN GEHEN</mark> Jedes Mal, wenn dieser Charakter in deinem Zug durch eine Herausforderung einen anderen Charakter verbannt, erhalten deine anderen Charaktere in diesem Zug je +1 ◆.

FR.name: Mulan
FR.title: Soldat impérial
FR.action: <mark>UN EXEMPLE</mark> Lorsque ce personnage en bannit un autre via un défi,tous vos autres personnages gagnent +1 ◆ pour le reste de ce tour.
